  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Card>
    Representation of a hand of cards. DON'T CHANGE THIS CLASS, YOU CAN DERIVE FROM THIS CLASS IF YOU WANT TO EXTEND IT FOR USE IN THE GAME IMPLEMENTATION, BUT NOT Created by zilles on 2/28/17.
